DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether compression lid margin increase microbial contamination risk patient undergo cataract surgery
DOC.brief_title: Compression Lid Margin Increase Microbial Contamination Risk Patients Undergoing Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) Age > 60 year ; ( 2 ) clinical diagnosis age relate cataract , without previous recent ocular surgery ; ( 3 ) undergo phacoemulsification implantation intraocular lens ; ( 4 ) able give inform consent . ( 1 ) inflammation eye part body within previous 3 month ; ( 2 ) chronic use type ophthalmic medication ; ( 3 ) contact lens wear ; ( 4 ) ocular surgery within past 3 month ; ( 5 ) use systemic antibiotic within 30 day ; ( 6 ) use eyedrops either eye within 3 day enrollment ; ( 7 ) need concurrent glaucoma , cornea surgery .
